  • Method Details

    • testReset

      @Test public void testReset()
      Tests if the lines are null after reset, i.e, the board is empty.

    • testDrawLine

      @Test public void testDrawLine()
      Tests if the board can draw lines.

    • testIsFull

      @Test public void testIsFull()
      Tests if after drawing lines in all possible locations, the board is full.

    • testIsEmpty

      @Test public void testIsEmpty()
      Tests if isEmpty() works correctly.

    • testDetermineBox

      @Test public void testDetermineBox() throws NonexistentBoxException
      Tests if the board can determine whether a box is completed. This test considers a dimension of size 5.
      Throws:
      NonexistentBoxException

    • testIsField

      @Test public void testIsField()
      Tests if the allowed indexes are correct.

    • testIsLine

      @Test public void testIsLine() throws InvalidMoveException
      Test if the board can determine whether a specific field is a line. This test considers a dimension of size 5.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException

    • testAssociateLinesWithBoxes

      @Test public void testAssociateLinesWithBoxes()
      Tests if the association between boxes and lines is correct. For example, box 0 has lines 0, 5, 6, 11; box 1 has lines 1, 6, 7, 12; box 2 has lines 2, 7, 8, 13; etc.

    • testDeepCopy

      @Test public void testDeepCopy()
      Tests that a board is copied properly. Tests if the copy is not the same object as the original.
